trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 配接器通常由 ASP.NET 自動建構，而且必須具有預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回的文字寫入器適用於指定配接器。

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 適用於指定配接器的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以判斷回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref>物件，其中包含要求的資訊，例如 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的引數識別項。

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: 來自要求物件的回傳資料集合。

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: 修改的版本 baseCollection 參數。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 評估是否裝置配接器集套用至指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: |類別 |傳回 |慣用轉譯類型 |檢查 JavaScript 屬性的值 | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>的值是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |傳回<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>`true`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A><xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |裝置功能的<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>傳回`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|檢查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A><xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。 |N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: 目前的要求內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
